REQUEST_DELETE_ACCOUNT.TITLE: Läsche vum Konto
REQUEST_DELETE_ACCOUNT.MESSAGE: Bass du sécher? Däi Konto an deng perséinlech Date wäerte fir ëmmer geläscht ginn. Alles wat's du op dëser Plattform gemaach hues wäert anonymiséiert ginn. Wann's du zoustëmms, schécke mir dir eng E-Mail mat engem Link fir d'Läschen ofzeschléissen.

Esoubal {threshold} Memberen dir hiert Vertrauen ausgedréckt hunn, duerfs eppes beaarbechte fir ze hëllefen d'Grupp ze administréieren.

TRUST_INFO.TITLE: Wat huet et mat dësem Muerte-Button op sech?

APPLICATION.ACCEPT_CONFIRMATION_TEXT: Bass du sécher, dass du {userName} an dëser Grupp unhuele wëlls?
APPLICATION.DECLINE_CONFIRMATION_TEXT: Bass du sécher, dass du d'Bewerbung vun {userName} ofleene wëlls?
APPLICATION.ACCEPTED: Du hues {userName} an dëser Grupp ugeholl!
APPLICATION.WHAT: Iwwert wat geet et an dësem Chat?
APPLICATION.HELP: Dëst ass ee Chat tëschent alle Membere vun {groupName} an der Persoun, déi sech bewerbt, {userName}. En ass dofir do fir jidderengem d'Chance ze gi fir sech kennenzeléieren ier dir entscheet fir d'Bewerbung ze akzeptéieren, ofzeleenen oder zréckzezéien.

INACTIVITY.WHAT: Wat heescht et inaktiv ze sinn?
INACTIVITY.HELP: All Persoun, déi sech wärend {dayCount} oder méi Deeg net an d'Grupp ageloggt huet, gëtt als inaktiv markéiert. Dës Notzer wäerte keng Benoriichtegunge via E-Mail méi kréien.

CONFLICT.STEPPER1a: Du bass derbäi ee Konflikt-Léisungsprozess an der ganzer Grupp ze starten!
CONFLICT.STEPPER1b: Dëst wäert all d'Memberen, déi beaarbechten duerfen, involvéiere fir déi bescht Léisung fir weiderzemaachen ze fannen.
CONFLICT.STEPPER2a: Merci dofir dass du dech ëm d'Gemeinschaft këmmers!
CONFLICT.STEPPER2b: Et ass wichteg sozial Konflikter unzeschwätzen, obwuel et heiansdo onangeneem si kann. Merci fir däi Courage!
CONFLICT.STEPPER3b: Dëse Prozess wäert een Chat an eng Ofstëmmung starten.
CONFLICT.STEPPER3c: Den Chat wäert fir all d'Memberen, déi beaarbechten duerfen, siichtbar sinn. Derbäi ass {userName}.
CONFLICT.STEPPER3d: D'Ofstëmmung ass anonym. Si wäert {votingDuration} Deeg daueren. Wärend dëser Zäit ka jiddereen seng Meenung änneren an anescht ofstëmmen esou oft wéi si wëllen.
CONFLICT.STEPPER4a: Erklär w.e.g. firwat's du dëse Konflikt-Léisungsprozess starts!
CONFLICT.STEPPER4b: Erklär denger Grupp firwat's du mengs, dass dëse Prozess justifizéiert ass a gebraucht gëtt. Dës Ausso wäert siichtbar si fir {userName} an all d'Memberen aus der Grupp, déi beaarbechten duerfen.
CONFLICT.WITH: Dëse Prozess ass dofir do fir ee Konflikt mat {userName} ze léisen

VOTING.HEADLINE: Wéi wëlls du mam aktuelle Konflikt mat {userName} weidermaachen?

REQUIREMENTS.ACTIVE_EDITORS: Deng Grupp huet {activeEditorsCount} aktiv Benotzer, déi beaarbechten duerfen. Du brauchs {requiredCount} fir ee Konflikt-Léisungsprozess ze starten.
REQUIREMENTS.NEWCOMER: Iers du ee Konflikt-Léisungsprozess starten duerfs, muss du méi Vertraue kréien a beaarbechten duerfen. An der Tëschenzäit frees de am Beschten een anere Member aus der Grupp fir de Prozess fir dech ze starten.

INFO.TITLE: Wéi funktionéiert dëse Prozess?
INFO.MESSAGE: Dëst ass eng Ofstëmmung mat Punkten, un där all Member aus der Grupp, déi beaarbechten duerf, deelhuele kann fir mat ze bestëmme wéi mat engem soziale Konflikt, deen déi ganz Grupp betrëfft, ëmgaange gi soll.

CREATION.TOAST: Du hues erfollegräich ee Konflikt-Léisungsprozess gestart

ISSUE.TITLE: Konflikter
ISSUE.PARTICIPANTS: {count} Membere goufen an dës Diskussioun dobäi gemaach.

VOTING.FURTHER_DISCUSSION: Weider Diskussiounen: Zäit verlängeren andeem's eng weider Ofstëmmung gestart gëtt

RESULTS.KEEP_DISCUSSING: Deng Grupp huet entscheet weider ze diskutéieren
RESULTS.ENDED_AT: Dës Ofstëmmungsronn ass den {date} eriwwer gaangen.
RESULTS.PARTICIPANTS: {number} Memberen hunn un der Ofstëmmung deelgeholl.
RESULTS.UNDECIDED: Leider konnt dëse Konflikt net entscheet ginn.
RESULTS.UNDECIDED_WHY: Et gëtt zwee méiglech Grënn fir dat:
RESULTS.UNDECIDED_REASON_1: de betraffene Benotzer huet d'Grupp verlooss wärend de Konflikt-Léisungsprozess nach am Gang war
RESULTS.UNDECIDED_REASON_2: keen huet iwwert dëse Konflikt ofgestëmmt

OFFER.NAME_HELPER: Kuerzen Numm fir dat wat's de ubitts
OFFER.MARK_AS_ARCHIVED_DESCRIPTION: Markéier dës Offer als archivéiert fir se aus den aktuellen Offeren erauszehuelen.

ADDRESS_PICKER.KEEP_EXISTING_LOCATION: behal den Uert op der Kaart
ADDRESS_PICKER.CHOOSE_LOCATION: wiel den Uert op der Kaart

UNSUBSCRIBE.FROM_GROUP: Desabonéieren vun alle Benoriichtegungen via E-Mail an {groupName}
UNSUBSCRIBE.COUNTS: Du hues dech vun {formerConversations} Ënnerhalungen an {formerReplies} Äntwerten desabonéiert.

ABOUT_KARROT.TITLE: Save things from being wasted, share them instead!
ABOUT_KARROT.SUBTITLE1: Karrot exists for groups of people who want to save things from being wasted and share them instead, allowing these groups to organise efficiently, on a local and voluntary basis.
ABOUT_KARROT.SUBTITLE2: Things such as food, bikes, clothes or whatever is being excessively thrown away or unused in the context of a consumerist society.
ABOUT_KARROT.VISION_INTRO: Karrot is a tool for all kinds of grassroots initiatives to connect and grow, supporting the co-ordination of face-to-face activities with a layer of digital infrastructure.
ABOUT_KARROT.ACTION: Have you already found a group nearby you? Or maybe you want to {startAGroup}? If you just want to try Karrot out, then create an account and join the Playground group for testing.
ABOUT_KARROT.EXISTING_GROUPS: A few groups already using Karrot

GROUPS.TITLE: Independent groups
GROUPS.SUBTITLE: Every group on karrot is completely independent and can have their own logo, processes and rules.
GROUPS.DESCRIPTION: Yet they are all displayed on the map so that people can find and connect to other groups in their location and even globally.

ACTIVITIES.TITLE: Distribution of tasks and activities
ACTIVITIES.SUBTITLE: Activities with a specific time and place, like food pickups in the case of foodsaving, can be entered in the software.
ACTIVITIES.DESCRIPTION: Each activity has a number of slots which members of the group can sign up for – this way everyone knows who goes where and when, and feedback can be given later.

OFFERS.TITLE: Share things
OFFERS.SUBTITLE: Create an ad-like offer of whatever you want to share or give away.
OFFERS.DESCRIPTION: Offers are visible to everyone in the group and people can show their interest on the offer's chat.

DEMOCRATIC.TITLE: Democratic and participative development
DEMOCRATIC.DESCRIPTION: Karrot is a free and open-source software developed with the feedback and participation of the people who use it. It is mainly developed by a small core team that is constantly in contact with people in different groups, in order to make sense of their diverging and converging needs and thus guide the development. We abide by the ethics of integrity and non-commercialization of data.
DEMOCRATIC.DESCRIPTION2: Developers and designers are obviously welcome to participate in its development. Check out the project on {code}.

COMMUNICATION.TITLE: Communication in the right context
COMMUNICATION.DESCRIPTION: Write a message that everyone in the group will see or a private message to someone. Everything related to a single activity or place can be discussed in their respective chats.

TRUST.TITLE: Democratic and trust-based group management
TRUST.DESCRIPTION: There are no admin superpowers in a Karrot group. People who receive enough trust-carrots from their peers will be able to edit and change settings in the group. When new people want to join your group they need to apply and answer questions your group can set, which anyone with editing rights can decline or approve. Likewise, if there is a conflict, the group can enter a voting system to resolve it in a communal way.

MAPS.TITLE: Maps and lists
MAPS.DESCRIPTION: You have a map of where the places and the people doing the activities are located. You have a nice list of upcoming activities and can sign up for them online.

TRANSPARENCY.TITLE: Transparency
TRANSPARENCY.DESCRIPTION: The history shows who did what and when. Everything from participating in an activity to creating and editing places is logged here.

NOTIFICATIONS.TITLE: Notifications
NOTIFICATIONS.DESCRIPTION: You get notified about empty activities, new messages and new people wanting to join your group. But you can also turn it all off if you wish more peace!

TRANSLATIONS.TITLE: Multi-language
TRANSLATIONS.DESCRIPTION: Karrot is fully translatable by the community and many languages are already added. To contribute more translations just visit the project on {translations}.

OPENSOURCE.TITLE: Open source
OPENSOURCE.DESCRIPTION: Everything is transparent and possibly changeable. We encourage groups to host their own instances of the platform, if they have the ability to do so. Still, we also provide access to a hosted version on karrot.world.

TEAM.TITLE: Responsive team
TEAM.DESCRIPTION: You can easily talk to the people developing Karrot, either on our {forum}, on {code} or in real-time on our {chat}.
